Angel, Monadic Deva

A very attractive humanlike creature with large, feathery silver wings and strong, broad shoulders; its hair is dark and its eyes are green.



Monadic Deva

CR 12

XP 19,200
NG Medium outsider (angel, extraplanar, good)
Init +7; Senses darkvision 60 ft., detect evil, low-light vision; Perception +25
Aura protective aura
DEFENSE
AC 26, touch 13, flat-footed 23 (+3 Dex, +13 natural| +4 deflection vs. evil)
hp 95 (10d10+40)
Fort +11, Ref +12, Will +7; +4 vs. poison, +4 resistance vs. evil
DR 10/evil; Immune acid, cold, petrification, death effects; Resist electricity 10, fire 10; SR 23
OFFENSE
Spd 40 ft., fly 90 ft. (good)
Melee +3 mace of smiting +20/+15 (1d8+10 plus solid blow)
Space 5 ft.; Reach 5 ft.
Spell-Like Abilities (CL 10th)
Constant—detect evil
At Will—aid, charm elemental (DC 18; elementals only), continual flame, discern lies (DC 18), dispel evil (DC 19), holy smite (DC 18), invisibility (self only), plane shift (DC 21), remove curse (DC 18), remove disease (DC 17), remove fear (DC 15)
7/day—cure light wounds, mirror image
3/day—cure serious wounds, holy word (DC 21), polymorph (self only)
1/day—heal, hold monster (DC 19), holy aura (DC 22)
STATISTICS
Str 24, Dex 16, Con 18, Int 18, Wis 18, Cha 19
Base Atk +10; CMB +17; CMD 30
Feats Alertness, Cleave, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack
Skills Bluff +17, Diplomacy +17, Fly +20, Heal +17, Knowledge (planes) +17, Knowledge (religion) +17, Perception +25, Sense Motive +21, Stealth +16, Survival +17; Racial Modifiers +4 Perception
Languages Celestial, Common, plus any three; truespeech
Combat Gear +3 mace of smiting
ECOLOGY
Environment any good-aligned plane
Organization solitary, pair, or squad (3-5)
Treasure double standard
SPECIAL ABILITIES
Solid Blow (Su) If a monadic deva strikes an opponent twice in one round with its mace, that creature takes an extra 1d8 points of damage.


Monadic devas are relatives of the astral deva and are usually found wandering the Ethereal or Elemental Planes. They serve as leaders and officers in the celestial armies.

Monadic devas stand about 7 feet tall and weigh about 220 pounds.

Monadic devas, like their brethren, enjoy combat. They use their mace of smiting and spell-like abilities when fighting opponents. Monadic devas always aid good-aligned creatures if they are being threatened or attacked by those of evil alignment.
